text: “Guigira buneŋ khare. Mba Zisas khothɨgav ana zɨn vui tuav, mbe kha suambarar ana mbui, ‘harigi ntɨɨri ma.’ Gu tuav zɨn vov, gu nza won nzɨgir Fhe Bakɨme, gu ara rotu mbui. Gu mba Moses suaŋgi tɨvi, gu za nta khothɨgap, gu vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ gumgi fhum khergi buni, gu vhɨra za nta khothɨgɨvra ki.
